statements: SELECT * FROM art_collection WHERE collector_id = 1;
SELECT artwork_name, artist FROM art_collection WHERE collector_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT artist FROM art_collection WHERE artwork_id > 10;
SELECT collector_id, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM art_collection GROUP BY collector_id;
SELECT * FROM art_collection WHERE artist LIKE 'Van Gogh%';
SELECT artwork_name, artist FROM art_collection WHERE collector_id = 1;
SELECT collector_id, artwork_id, artist FROM art_collection WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh' ORDER BY collector_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT artist FROM art_collection WHERE collector_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY artist;
SELECT collector_id, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM art_collection GROUP BY collector_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT artwork_name, artist FROM art_collection WHERE collector_id = 3 AND artist LIKE '%Picasso%' ORDER BY artwork_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE year > 2000
SELECT id, title, artist FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh'
SELECT title, year FROM artworks ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT id, name, email, location FROM collectors WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT id, title, artist, year FROM artworks WHERE title LIKE '%Sunflower%'
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, artist, year FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh';
SELECT id, title, year FROM artworks WHERE year > 1800 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM artworks GROUP BY artist HAVING total_artworks > 5 ORDER BY total_artworks DESC;
SELECT c.name AS collector_name, a.title AS artwork_title FROM collectors c JOIN artworks a ON c.id = a.id WHERE c.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM ArtCollectors
SELECT collector_name, collection_size FROM ArtCollectors
SELECT piece_name, artist_name, year_created, medium FROM ArtPieces
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_price FROM PurchaseHistory

SELECT collector_name, collection_size, piece_name, artist_name, year_created, medium, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM ArtCollectors JOIN ArtPieces ON ArtCollectors.collector_id = ArtPieces.collector_id JOIN PurchaseHistory ON ArtPieces.piece_id = PurchaseHistory.piece_id
SELECT * FROM ArtCollectors;
SELECT piece_name, artist_name, medium FROM ArtPieces ORDER BY year_created DESC;

SELECT collector_name, collection_size, piece_name, purchase_date FROM ArtCollectors JOIN ArtPieces ON ArtCollectors.collector_id = ArtPieces.collector_id JOIN PurchaseHistory ON ArtPieces.piece_id = PurchaseHistory.piece_id WHERE collector_name LIKE 'John%' AND purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT collector_name, SUM(collection_size) AS total_collection_size FROM ArtCollectors GROUP BY collector_name HAVING total_collection_size > 500;

SELECT ArtCollectors.collector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM ArtCollectors JOIN ArtPieces ON ArtCollectors.collector_id = ArtPieces.collector_id JOIN PurchaseHistory ON ArtPieces.piece_id = PurchaseHistory.piece_id GROUP BY ArtCollectors.collector_name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM collectors;
SELECT collector_name, collection_name FROM collectors WHERE collection_type = 'Paintings';
SELECT collector_id, collector_name, collection_name FROM collectors ORDER BY collector_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE year_created > 2000 AND price > 1000;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, medium, price FROM artworks WHERE artist_name LIKE 'Van Gogh%';
SELECT * FROM collectors WHERE collector_id = 1;
SELECT collector_name, collection_name FROM collectors WHERE collection_type = 'private' ORDER BY collector_name ASC;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, year_created FROM artworks WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_id;
SELECT artwork_name, artist_name, price FROM artworks WHERE medium = 'oil' AND price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM collectors;
SELECT name, location FROM collectors WHERE collector_id = 1;
SELECT title, year_created, medium FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh';
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT collector_id, COUNT(artwork_id) AS total_artworks FROM artworks GROUP BY collector_id HAVING COUNT(artwork_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM collectors;
SELECT name, location FROM collectors WHERE collector_id = 1;
SELECT artwork_id, title, artist, year_created FROM artworks WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY year_created DESC;

SELECT a.title, c.category_name FROM artworks a JOIN artwork_categories ac ON a.artwork_id = ac.artwork_id JOIN categories c ON ac.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Abstract' ORDER BY a.title ASC;
SELECT AVG(appraised_value) AS avg_value, appraiser FROM appraisals GROUP BY appraiser HAVING avg_value > 50000 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
